contents.name: My History
contents.description: Hi, hello, My name is Abdullah Maqsood, I come from Pakistan, City in Pakistan. Now I‚Äôve joined as a React & Next.js developer at Bytewise Fellowship.

contents.name: What am i Doing
contents.description: I am currently focusing on learning front-end frameworks such as React and Next.js, alongside honing my backend skills, with a particular emphasis on mastering user-friendly technologies like Node.js. Keeping pace with the latest technological advancements, I am dedicated to continuously expanding my knowledge and applying emerging concepts. Concurrently, I am actively crafting my portfolio through the development of personal projects, ensuring practical application of my evolving skill set.

contents.name: What Next
contents.description: My goal now is to master Front-End and Back-End technology. So that I can build a solution to an existing problem easily. Even though it is not easy and it takes a long time, I believe I can achieve it if I practice and learn continuously.

contents.name: Dreams and Wishes
contents.description: I aspire to join esteemed companies like Google or Microsoft, aiming for roles in software development engineering or front-end development. I am determined to persistently pursue these opportunities, continuously refining my skills and knowledge until I achieve success. and be an inspiration to others to become a good mentor to guide others to create a better future.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: Explore my experiences, Rewards, and education, as well as my activeness

contents.name: Learning Next.js
contents.description: Mastered Next.js for building, styling, and deploying responsive applications.:

list.name: Gained skills in Next.js, including setup, building dynamic pages, styling with TailwindCSS, and deploying on platforms like Vercel.
Learned data fetching, error handling, authentication with NextAuth.js, and creating AI-driven chatbots with OpenAI.

contents.name: Learning ECMAScript 6+ (ES6+)
contents.description: Gained comprehensive skills in modern JavaScript features and asynchronous programming.:

list.name: Mastered ECMAScript features like destructuring, spread operator, and various iteration methods.
Developed proficiency in handling promises and using async/await for efficient asynchronous operations.

contents.name: JavaScript Essential Training
contents.description: Enhanced JavaScript skills through fundamentals, advanced topics, and practical coding exercises.:

list.name: Learned key concepts like variables, conditionals, loops, and DOM scripting for dynamic web development.
Practiced object manipulation, array management, and event handling through interactive exercises.

contents.name: City University of Science and Information Technology Peshawar
contents.description: I hold a Bachelor of Computer Science from City University of Science and Information Technology Peshawar, where I focused on coursework covering Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, and Object-Oriented Programming. Proficient in Python, C++, and JavaScript, I am equipped to excel in software development roles.
